nodedef.name: GWControlService
nodedef.attr: Supports controlling the Guidewire messaging, batch, logging and the profiler from a VDAB node. This requires installation of VDAB gosu code to expose these features as webservices.

datadef.name: Product
datadef.attr: Select the Guidewire product from the Pick Popup. Refreshing will populate the default values for the Host and Port.

datadef.name: User
datadef.attr: Identify a Guidewire user if security is required.

datadef.name: Host
datadef.attr: The domain or IP where the Guidewire product is installed.

datadef.name: Port
datadef.attr: The port where the Guidewire product is installed.

datadef.name: ControlArea
datadef.attr: Select the general area being controlled from the Pick Popup.

datadef.name: Command
datadef.attr: Select the control command available for that Control Area from the Pick Popup.

datadef.name: Scope
datadef.attr: Select which of the items in this group should be effected. Select one at a time followed by a return.

datadef.name: Parameter
datadef.attr: Select an argument or parameter that applies to this control operation.

nodedef.name: GWCheckSource
nodedef.attr: GWCheckSource polls and checks if the Guidewire product is running and accessible.

nodedef.name: GWCheckService
nodedef.attr: Determines if the Guidewire product is running and accessible

datadef.name: Host
datadef.attr: The domain or IP where the Guidewire product is installed.

datadef.name: Port
datadef.attr: The port where the Guidewire product is installed.

datadef.name: Product
datadef.attr: Select the Guidewire product from the Pick Popup.

nodedef.name: GWMsgDelegateSource
nodedef.attr: GWMsgDelegateSource polls the workitem table in the Guidewire database to determine the message delegate backlogs.

nodedef.name: GWMsgDelegateService
nodedef.attr: GWMsgDelegateService read the workitem table in the Guidewire database to determine the message delegate backlogs.

datadef.name: DatabaseType
datadef.attr: Select the Guidewire database type from the Pick Popup. H2, Oracle and SQLServer are supported.

datadef.name: Product
datadef.attr: Select the Guidewire product from the Pick Popup.

datadef.name: Version
datadef.attr: Select the Guidewire major product version from the Pick Popup.

datadef.name: TableSpace
datadef.attr: If needed this is the tablespace that will be added as a prefix to the table name.

nodedef.name: GWMessageSource
nodedef.attr: GWMessageSource polls the message table in the Guidewire database to determine the message backlogs.

nodedef.name: GWMessageService
nodedef.attr: GWMessageService read the message table in the Guidewire database to determine the message backlogs.

datadef.name: MonitorStatuses
datadef.attr: Select the Guidewire message states (Inflight, Unsent, Error and Retryable) that should be monitored. If not selected the node monitors all of them

datadef.name: DatabaseType
datadef.attr: Select the Guidewire database type from the Pick Popup. H2, Oracle and SQLServer are supported.

datadef.name: Product
datadef.attr: Select the Guidewire product from the Pick Popup.

datadef.name: Version
datadef.attr: Select the Guidewire major product version from the Pick Popup.

datadef.name: TableSpace
datadef.attr: If needed this is the tablespace that will be added as a prefix to the table name.
